Weighted Voronoi Tesselation¶

This section contains the functions used to implement the WVT algorihm

Weighted Voronoi Tesselation¶

Set of functions required for Bayesian analysis using LUCI

LUCI.LuciBayesian.log_likelihood(theta, x, y, yerr, model)¶

theta - list of parameters for gaussian fit
